text:
="preserve">Rudolf Arnold Nieberding (May 4, 1838 in Konitz, West Prussia - October 10, 1912 in Berlin) was a German jurist and politician.
Nieberding studied law at the University of Breslau, the University of Heidelberg and the Humboldt-University of Berlin.
He started to work in the civil service of Prussia in 1861, followed by the civil service of the German Empire in 1872.
He was Minister of Justice of the German Empire from 1893 to 1909.
He died at the age of 74 in 1912.
